cardset.whitecard: My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic.
Sharks With Fricken Lazer-Beams Strapped To Their Foreheads.
The Men Who Stare At Goats.
Hugging your grandma while you have an erection.
That guy who is pretty much a dick but you’re still friends with him anyway.
That crazy bitch you work with.
The second time I got crabs.
Richard simmons in a pink sparkly tanktop.
Boobs that sag down to her knees.
Realizing too late that there is no toilet paper left.
Going to black friday sales at 4am.
Breath so bad that your butt is mad at your mouth.
A bitchy email from your boss.
